job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtJob DescriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtInductive Automation the leader in cuttingedge software for the industrial sector and beyond is looking to add talented people to our rapidly growing teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are a unique innovative and fun company with a strong mission to empower our customers to swiftly turn great ideas into reality by removing all technological and economic obstacles We have a huge passion for our product and our customers no matter what role you might play in the company you can sense that there is something special about what we do and who we areltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWere looking for a Software Engineer to join our Information Systems department as we design build test and support the applications and systems that keep our organization moving forward Youll partner with stakeholders from other business units like Software Engineering Sales Support Finance and Marketing to develop new solutions for complex business needs enhance existing applications and services and improve how our systems facilitate the processes of the businessltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtCollaborates with team members to design develop maintain and enhance software solutions built in a variety of technologiesltligtltligtWorks with design teams project owners and stakeholders to understand the needs functionality and user flow of requested featuresltligtltligtEnsures features are well tested documented and deployed safely with no interruptions to production systemsltligtltligtWrites code that is traceable in production to provide expedient bug tracing and quick resolutionsltligtltligtParticipates in crossfunctional discussions to clarify objectives and propose solutionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelor Degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering or equivalent experienceltligtltligtStrong Python experienceltligtltligtExperience writing complex SQL queries for normalized dataltligtltligtExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsltligtltligtExperience in gathering and analyzing requirementsltligtltligtExcellent technical troubleshooting skillsltligtltligtFamiliarity with Web technologies years experience developing customerfacing softwareltligtltligtExperience in fullstack development of internal or customerfacing systemsltligtltligtExperience in developing and interacting with
